## PerformanceStatistics.(constructor)

Creates an instance of PerformanceStatistics. Overrides the current `instance`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(enabled?: boolean, maxNumFrames?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  enabled | boolean | If <code>false</code> the performance values will not be stored. |
|  maxNumFrames | number | The maximum number of frames that are to be stored.  PerformanceStatistics |
